import { Link, useLocation } from 'react-router-dom' import logoSvg from '../assets/img/pizza-logo.svg' import cartSvg from '../assets/img/cart.svg' import { Search } from './Search' import { useSelector } from 'react-redux' import { selectCart } from '../redux/slices/cart/slice' export const Header: React.FC = () => { const { totalPrice, items } = useSelector(selectCart); const location = useLocation(); const totalCount = items.reduce((sum: number, item: { count: number }) => sum + item.count, 0); return (

React Pizza

самая вкусная пицца во вселенной

{location.pathname !== '/cart' &&
{totalPrice} ₽
{totalCount}
}
) }
